sentence: So far, Trump has endorsed primary opponents for at least five of them, including Gonzalez (who's retiring), Reps. Liz Cheney of Wyoming, Jaime Herrera Beutler of Washington, and Peter Meijer and Fred Upton of Michigan, who serve neighboring districts on the west side of the state.
title: Ten House Republicans voted to impeach Trump. Some then fell silent while others spoke up

sentence: As for the rest of the contingent Washington's Jaime Herrera Beutler, Wyoming's Liz Cheney, Michigan's Peter Meijer, Washington's Dan Newhouse, South Carolina's Tom Rice, and California's David Valadao each appear to be running for re-election this year.
author: Steve Benen
title: Another GOP member of the Impeachment 10 heads for the exits

sentence: Rep. Peter Meijer Meijer, Upton's Michigan colleague, cast his impeachment vote just days after being sworn in for his first term in Congress.
author: Kate Scanlon
title: A year later, where 10 House Republicans who voted to impeach Trump stand politically

sentence: Rep. Peter Meijer (R-Mich.) faces John Gibbs, a former Trump administration official.
author: Cristina Marcos
title: Veteran lawmaker's exit has House GOP trending toward Trump

sentence: Trump has also vowed revenge on the other GOP impeachment supporters: Rep. Tom Rice of South Carolina, Jaime Herrera Beutler of Washington, Dan Newhouse of Washington, Peter Meijer of Michigan and David Valadao of California.
author: David Jackson
title: Rep. Fred Upton - another Donald Trump Republican impeacher - announces his retirement

sentence: I think there's always a strong benefit to having people who can reach back and say, You know what, I remember when this happened 20 years ago,'? said first-term Rep. Peter Meijer (R-Mich.), pointing to Katko's and Upton's wisdom and sage experience.? But he added that as much as his departing colleagues will be missed, the ebb and flow of retirements and new additions helps prevent the body from becoming stagnant.
title: Seeking: GOP dealmakers who won't 'burn the House down'. Apply to: Kevin McCarthy.
